com.gracenote.mmid.MobileSDK

Class GNOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gracenote.mmid.MobileSDK.GNOperations

  • public class GNOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the operations that can be performed by the Mobile Client. Each operation is implemented as a static method. There are three types of operations provided:
    • Audio recognition operations
    • Fingerprint generation operations
    • Search operations
    To invoke an operation call the associated method. While an operation is running progress notifications can be received by the application. When an operation completes, results are delivered via a Result Ready Object. Operations can be canceled. For more information, see the Mobile Client Implementation Guide.

      • fingerprintMIDStreamFromMic

        public static void fingerprintMIDStreamFromMic(GNFingerprintResultReady resultReady,
                               GNConfig config)
        Records audio from the microphone and generates a fingerprint. The generated fingerprint can be used to search Gracenote's database for matches using Gracenote's MID-Stream product.
        Parameters:
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance
        config - Operation configuration

      • fingerprintMIDFileFromFile

        public static void fingerprintMIDFileFromFile(GNFingerprintResultReady resultReady,
                              GNConfig config,
                              java.lang.String filename)
        Generates a fingerprint for an audio file. The generated fingerprint can be used to search Gracenote's database for matches using Gracenote's MID-File product.

        To process the audio file, Mobile Client requires write access to the directory where the audio file is stored. The storage media that contains the audio file must also have memory available for Mobile Client to use. The required space is estimated at 4Mb for fingerprinting a single file and up to 20Mb for fingerprinting multiple files concurrently.

        Parameters:
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance
        config - Operation configuration
        filename - Name and path of the audio file

      • recognizeMIDStreamFromMic

                             GNConfig config)
        Records audio from the microphone and recognizes it using Gracenote's MID-Stream product.
        Parameters:

        config - Operation configuration

      • recognizeMIDFileFromFile

        public static void recognizeMIDFileFromFile(GNSearchResultReady resultReady,
                            GNConfig config,
                            java.lang.String filename)
        Recognizes an audio file using Gracenote's MID-File product.

        To process the audio file, Mobile Client requires write access to the directory where the audio file is stored. The storage media that contains the audio file must also have memory available for Mobile Client to use. The required space is estimated at 4Mb for recognizing a single file and up to 20Mb for recognizing multiple files concurrently.

        Parameters:
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance
        config - Operation configuration
        filename - Name and path of the audio file

      • searchByText

        public static void searchByText(GNSearchResultReady resultReady,
                GNConfig config,
                java.lang.String artist,
                java.lang.String albumTitle,
                java.lang.String trackTitle)
        Searches Gracenote's database for matches to artist name, album title, and track title. Not all fields are required. For best results, provide as many fields as possible.
        Parameters:
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance
        config - Operation configuration
        artist - Name of the artist
        albumTitle - Title of the album
        trackTitle - Title of the track

      • searchByLyricFragment

        public static void searchByLyricFragment(GNSearchResultReady resultReady,
                         GNConfig config,
                         java.lang.String lyricFragment,
                         java.lang.String artist)
        Searches Gracenote's database for matches to artist name and lyric fragment. Artist name is not required. For best results, provide artist name where possible.
        Parameters:
        resultReady - Result Ready Object instance
        config - Operation configuration
        lyricFragment - Fragment of track lyrics
        artist - Name of the artist
